sentence.Network_en: He is impecunious, does not know anyone who can lend mony.
sentence.Network_cn: 他身无分文，也不认识任何可以借钱的人。

sentence.Network_en: Cecil Fridjohn, my father, came from an impecunious Irish Jewish family.
sentence.Network_cn: 塞西尔·弗雷特, 我的父亲, 来自贫穷的爱尔兰的犹太家庭.

sentence.Network_en: They are independent, impecunious and able to tolerate all degrees of discomfort.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们独立自主的, 囊中羞涩的,并且能够忍受各种不便.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... impecuniosity 没有钱 impecunious 没有钱的 impedance 阻抗.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... immanent 内在的>外显的 impecunious 贫穷的>过分丰富的/繁荣的 impenitent 不悔悟的>后悔的.
一份无节操的背单词方法 ... 1。ramble v. 漫游 2。impecunious adj. (经常)没有钱的, 身无分文的, 贫穷的 3。ambulate v. 走动.
离开校园，初入社会的大学生们则成了囊中羞涩的(impecunious)毕业一族。如何精打细算，避免入不敷出呢？

list.abs: Cecil Fridjohn , my father , came from an impecunious Irish Jewish family ., 塞西尔 · 弗雷特 , 我的父亲 , 来自贫穷的爱尔兰的犹太家庭.
Maria's parents were not impressed with the impecunious young man : no doubt they had discovered his father'S lamentable financial record .玛丽亚的父母对这个贫穷的年轻人没有什么好印象。毫无疑问，他们知道了他父亲糟糕的经济状况。
they are a titled but impecunious family ., 他们家有头衔却一贫如洗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from in- 'not' + obsolete pecunious 'having money, wealthy' (from Latin pecuniosus, from pecunia 'money')

entry.tran: 没钱的;一文不名的;一贫如洗的
entry.def: Someone who is impecunious has very little money.

means.word_mean: 1. not having enough money to pay for necessities

auth_sentence.content: Every impecunious January drinker needs this.
